channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report I-2025020065
item.description:
Report I-2025020065

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T00:52:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-08
  • City: Pittsburg
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During loading operation facility loading pump malfunctioned causing excess pressure in loading line. Excess pressure resulted in loading line being dislodged and release of material into retention area. Operations halted and pump reset along with loading line. Loading completed without additional incident. Facility personnel cleaned released material.

item.title: Report I-2025020064
item.description:
Report I-2025020064

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T00:52:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-05
  • City: Newberry
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During unloading operations consignee storage tank high level sensor failed to halt excess material frorn entering tank causing overfill. Operations halted and remaining material redirected to secondary storage tank. Unloading completed without additional incident. Facility personnel cleaned.released material.

item.title: Report X-2025021225
item.description:
Report X-2025021225

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-01T21:20:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED AT THE BOTTOM OF BLACK AT CLERK STATION. THE PACKAGE HAD ORIENTATION ARROWS. IT WAS BROUGHT BACK TO THE DMP AND WAS DISCOVERED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. HAZMAT HELPDESK WAS CALLED.
